metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11372 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read in MediaInfoLib::File__Tags_Helper::Synched_Test in Tag/File__Tags.cpp in MediaInfoLib in MediaArea MediaInfo 18.12 leads to a crash. It was discovered that MediaInfo contained multiple security issues when handling certain multimedia files. If a user were tricked into opening a crafted multimedia file, an attacker could cause MediaInfo to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libmediainfo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
